com.satispay.protocore.dh

Interface DH


  • public interface DH
    Created by domenicovisconti on 19/04/16. This interface describes the API exposed for the DH network requests.

    • Method Summary

      • exchange

        @POST(value="v2/dh/exchange")
rx.Observable<ExchangeResponseBean> exchange(@Body
                                                                           ExchangeRequestBean exchangeRequestBean)
        This method performs the first step of the DH process
        Parameters:
        exchangeRequestBean - the bean containing all the information needed to complete the first dh step ExchangeRequestBean
        Returns:
        an Observable that emit the network response
